isTokenRegistered(address).details: Check whether a token is registered

quoteRegisterTokenFee().details: Quote a fee in Ether for registering a token, covering 1. Delivery costs to BridgeHub 2. XCM Execution costs on AssetHub

quoteSendTokenFee(address,uint32,uint128.details: Quote a fee in Ether for sending a token 1. Delivery costs to BridgeHub 2. XCM execution costs on destinationChain

registerToken(address).details: Register an ERC20 token and create a wrapped derivative on AssetHub in the `ForeignAssets` pallet.

sendToken(address,uint32,(uint8,bytes),u.details: Send ERC20 tokens to parachain `destinationChain` and deposit into account `destinationAddress`

documentation.text: @dev Emitted once the funds are locked and an outbound message is successfully queued.
@dev Emitted when a command is sent to register a new wrapped token on AssetHub
@dev Check whether a token is registered
@dev Register an ERC20 token and create a wrapped derivative on AssetHub in the `ForeignAssets` pallet.
@dev Send ERC20 tokens to parachain `destinationChain` and deposit into account `destinationAddress`
